title: Ep 548 | Jase's Tragic TV Failure & Phil Names One Critical Page from the Bible!
description:
Jase breaks down the distinct advantage people under 30 have regarding technology and shares a tragic story about failing to successfully operate a television. Phil does a true deep dive into the book of Hebrews and lays out the series of events that pinpoint exactly when the kingdom arrived on the earth. Jase details the ways that humans cannot please God through earthly wisdom and good deeds. And Al discusses the people who grow up in church thinking that they must strive for perfection through performance, when Jesus has already made you without blemish.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://Scoremaster.com/PHIL and get a free 7 day trial and see how many points you have to add

Visit https://MoinkBox.com/Robertson and get free Filet Mignon for an entire year
